CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

September 29, 2008

[Cite as 09/29/2008 Case Announcements, 2008-Ohio-4923.]

MEDIATION REFERRALS

2008-1791. Sonnet Investments, L.L.C. v. Cuyahoga Cty. Bd. of Revision.

The following ease has been referred to mediation pursuant to S.CtPrac.R. XIV(6):

Board of Tax Appeals, No. 2006-A-320.
